values: 传播；蔓延；扩散；展开；伸开；覆盖面；幅员；范围；宽度；涂抹物；多样性；品种；跨页文章；[金融]价差；点差；（桌上或床上的）铺盖；（餐桌上的）摆设；食物品种
展开；铺开；摊开；蔓延；扩散；传播；涂抹；敷；分散；普及；摆放；铺设；开张（商店、市场等）；使分布；使散布；布置；安排；推广；传递（信息、知识等）；使遍布；使弥漫；展示；陈列；伸展（四肢等）；张开（翅膀等）；分期还清（债务）；分散（风险）

synonym.mean: 传播，散布；展开；伸展；铺开

pos_mean_info_list.mean: [建] 撒布机；散布者；推广者

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指把一定数量的东西分成若干等份进行分发。
指自觉地努力推广，也指宣传或散布。
普通用词，使用广泛。指传播疾病、思想、文化、习惯或谣言等。
既指某物在一物体内循环流动，又可指在一定范围内传播物品、刊物或思想、语言等。
普通用词，指用暴力等手段使人或物向四处散开，或把物随意撒开。
指光线、声音或气味等在空中传送或散布，强调覆盖面积与物质分布相对密度之间的关系。
指一直延伸、蔓延，侧重遍及。
多指把一群人或物等彻底驱散。

word_group.brief_definition: 遍及；遍布各地；四散蔓延
传播到, 蔓延到, 扩散到
扩散出去, 铺开, 蔓延出来
像野火般蔓延, 迅速传开
展翅高飞(更自信地尝试新事物)
样样都抓哪样都抓不好
考虑到多种可能, 大面积地排查, 撒开网(寻找)
预计分数差；点源能量传播
扩展某人的活动和兴趣；开始新的活动或兴趣

bilingual.source: English spread through trade and the media.
bilingual.target: 英语通过贸易和媒体传播。

bilingual.source: English spread more quickly all over the world after television was invented.
bilingual.target: 电视发明后，英语在全世界传播得更快。

bilingual.source: This helped to spread the popularity of tea and the tea plant to more places around the world.
bilingual.target: 这有助于将茶和茶树的普及传播到世界更多地方。

bilingual.source: The spread of Sars was very rapid.
bilingual.target: 非典的传播速度非常快。
我们的使命是传播知识。

bilingual.source: The spread of the virus is alarming.
bilingual.target: 病毒的传播是令人担忧的。
这位歌手的名声迅速传播开来。

bilingual.source: The teacher's duty is to spread knowledge.
bilingual.target: 老师的职责是传播知识。

bilingual.source: The spread of coronavirus is very fast.
bilingual.target: 冠状病毒的传播速度非常快。

list.abstract: spread，英文单词，可作动词、名词、形容词，译为伸开、传播、范围、敲平、展开的等。
Spread，美国电影。 位于美国加利福尼亚州的洛杉矶，是一个充满梦想并能让很多年轻人实现梦想的地方。帅气能干的小伙子尼基傣（阿什顿·库彻饰）便是凭借自己的努力在这个大都市里实现了自己的部分梦想：汽车、金钱、地位，自然年轻貌美的女人们的青睐也随之而来。

yingyinNormal.en: Surprising as it may seem, farts can spread disease.
yingyinNormal.zh: 令人惊讶的是，放屁也会传播疾病。

yingyinNormal.en: Holy oil from the pontiff who wishes to spread Christianity throughout my lands.
yingyinNormal.zh: 圣油，罗马教皇希望以此将基督教义传播到我的国土。

yingyinNormal.en: After all, the spread of bacteria is more likely to occur with wet skin and rubbing your wet hands on your clothes or touching the bathroom door can often contaminate them even more.
yingyinNormal.zh: 毕竟，在湿皮肤上，细菌容易传播手湿湿的擦在衣服上，或者去握厕所把手，只会使手更脏。

yingyinNormal.en: This urban transformation is spread across China.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这种城市化进程遍及整个中国。

yingyinNormal.en: You want to spread your wings, that's great. But you can't spread your wings and fly to nowhere.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你想展翅高飞，这很好。但是你不能漫无目的得展翅高飞。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Night at the Museum: Secret of the Tomb》

yingyinNormal.en: Wow, this is quite a spread. What is all this stuff?
yingyinNormal.zh: 哦，摆了这么大一桌子。这些都是什么啊？

yingyinNormal.en: A darkness is coming. It will spread to every corner of the land.
yingyinNormal.zh: 黑暗到来了，蔓延到了中土的每个角落。

yingyinNormal.en: Spread each slice with butter and marmalade. Add a layer of sultanas.
yingyinNormal.zh: 每一片上涂满黄油和果酱，加一层葡萄干。

yingyinNormal.en: Now spread them out on the table face down. Pick one, look at it. Okay.
yingyinNormal.zh: 正面朝下，摊在桌子上，挑一张，看一眼。好的。

yingyinNormal.en: And when we drive them off, what then? Will they not spread to other lands?
yingyinNormal.zh: 就算赶跑了又怎样？他们难道不会跑到其他地方去吗？

yingyinNormal.en: When you find a cancer in an organization, you must cut it out before it can spread.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当你在组织里发现了一枚毒瘤，必须得在它扩散前尽早切除。

yingyinNormal.en: The cold has now spread to my special place, so I'm gonna do the short version of this.
yingyinNormal.zh: 冷空气已经蔓延到我“那里”了所以我会长话短说。

yingyinNormal.en: They don't manipulate search results, but let's just say a big spread in Vanity Fair...
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们没有篡改搜索结果，但是如果在《名利场》上大做广告...

yingyinNormal.en: Ugh. She was in Vera's Vogue spread. I don't use Vera's models. None of these are right.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她参与了梵拉的"时尚"杂志推广。我不会用梵拉的模特的，没一个会适合。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, that ends now. Spread the word. Until I have the man-cub, these hills are my hills.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，一切到此为止，都听好了，在我抓到人孩之前，这片山林归我所有。

yingyinNormal.en: And this layout for the winter wonderland spread, not wonderful yet. Oh, okay. I'll look at it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 还有这个“冬季奇境”折页的版面，一点都不新奇。好的，我再考虑一下。

yingyinNormal.en: With 80% of infectious diseases spread by our hands, it's clear that washing them is important.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有百分之八十的传染病是由手部散播出去，洗手就显得特别重要了。

yingyinNormal.en: There's less time, because the time has to be spread extra thin over all the places, like butter.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但时间没那么多，因为时间会被分成薄薄的片分布在每个地方，就像黄油。

yingyinNormal.en: Pigs and birds. That's how these things spread in the past. We need to do something about those hogs.
yingyinNormal.zh: 猪和禽类，过去疾病都是通过这些动物传染的，我们得处理一下那些猪。

yingyinNormal.en: These magnificent expanses are immense nets spread out in the sun, which are used to dry the harvests.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这些展开的绵延不断的网是用来晾晒收获的海藻的。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 蔓延; 传播; 延伸
摊开; 铺开; 展开
宽度; 面积; 翼展
分若干次进行; 由若干人分摊

范围; 幅度
酒宴; 丰富的餐食
区域; 一大片
广泛; 多样
文章; 广告

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: distribute or disperse (something) over a certain area;
sense_info_list.zh: 蔓延; 传播; 延伸

examination_example.sentence: Large American companies are much more globalized than ever before, with supply chains <highlight>spread</highlight> across a larger number of countries.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美国大公司比以往任何时候都更加全球化，供应链遍布更多的国家。

examination_example.sentence: The relationship was also stronger in places where happiness was <highlight>spread</highlight> more equally.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种关系在幸福分布更均匀的地方也更牢固。

examination_example.sentence: An emerging body of research shows that positive health habits <highlight>spread</highlight> through networks of friends via social communication.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最近大量研究表明，良好的卫生习惯也是通过社交在朋友圈中传播。

sense_info_list.en: open out (something) so as to extend its surface area, width, or length
sense_info_list.zh: 摊开; 铺开; 展开

sense_info_list.en: how wide something is or the area that something covers
sense_info_list.zh: 宽度; 面积; 翼展

sense_info_list.en: separate something into parts and divide them between different times or different people
sense_info_list.zh: 分若干次进行; 由若干人分摊

sense_info_list.en: apply a substance to an object or surface in an even layer
sense_info_list.zh: 涂; 敷; 覆盖物

sense_info_list.en: the difference between two rates or prices
sense_info_list.zh: [金融]差额; 差幅

sense_info_list.en: the range or variety of something
sense_info_list.zh: 范围; 幅度

sense_info_list.en: a large meal, especially one that is prepared for a special occasion
sense_info_list.zh: 酒宴; 丰富的餐食

sense_info_list.en: an area of land or water
sense_info_list.zh: 区域; 一大片

sense_info_list.en: a range or variety of people or things
sense_info_list.zh: 广泛; 多样

sense_info_list.en: an article or advertisement covering several columns or pages of a newspaper or magazine, especially one on two facing pages
sense_info_list.zh: 文章; 广告

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 普通用词，意思是指让某些具体或抽象的东西(知识、疾病、谣言等)散开、传开，也指人或事物的舒展。
指运用武力、暴力或其他力量使人或物杂乱地朝各方向散开，也可指投掷抛洒、使物体散开、四处坠落。
表示“驱散、散开”，表示使人或物散开的更广、更为彻底，以至于群体或整体完全分开。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 拓展; 扩张; 传播
展开; 使散开; 张开

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: distribute or disperse (something) over a certain area
sense_info_list.zh: 拓展; 扩张; 传播

examination_example.sentence: As automation <highlight>spreads</highlight> further, the question is how these remote communities will survive when the old jobs are eliminated.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着自动化的进一步普及，问题是当旧的工作岗位被淘汰时，这些偏远的社区将如何生存。

examination_example.sentence: But when everyone has perfect information, traffic jams simply <highlight>spread</highlight> onto the side roads that seem to offer a way round them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是，当每个人都有完美的信息时，交通堵塞就会蔓延到似乎提供了一条绕过它们的路的辅道上。

examination_example.sentence: The fire <highlight>spread</highlight> through the cathedral's roof, made up of hundreds of oak beams, some dating back to the 13th century.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大火蔓延到大教堂的屋顶，屋顶由数百根橡木横梁组成，其中一些可以追溯到13世纪。

examination_example.sentence: In emerging economies, rural communities are bypassing the wires and wooden poles that <highlight>spread</highlight> power.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在新兴经济中，农村社区正绕过输送电力的电线和木杆。

sense_info_list.en: open out (something) so as to extend its surface area, width, or length
sense_info_list.zh: 展开; 使散开; 张开

word_usage.usage: spread既可用作及物动词，也可用作不及物动词。其宾语后接介词on组成短语，表示“把…铺在或涂在…上”； 接介词with组成短语，表示“用…铺满或涂满”。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 拓展; 扩张; 传播
展开; 使散开; 张开
分若干次进行; 由若干人分摊
涂抹; 覆盖; 涂层; 覆盖物

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: distribute or disperse (something) over a certain area;
sense_info_list.zh: 拓展; 扩张; 传播

examination_example.sentence: What is the environmentalist concerned about the <highlight>spread</highlight> of Devil Firefish in the Mediterranean?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 环保主义者对地中海魔鬼火鱼的蔓延有何担忧?

examination_example.sentence: He hopes his acts of charity will influence others to <highlight>spread</highlight> positive actions in their own towns.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他希望他的慈善行为能够影响其他人在自己的城镇传播积极的行动。

examination_example.sentence: His message and star power has <highlight>spread</highlight> all over the country.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他的信息和作为明星的影响力传遍了全国。

sense_info_list.en: open out (something) so as to extend its surface area; width; or length
sense_info_list.zh: 展开; 使散开; 张开

examination_example.sentence: Forests are <highlight>spreading</highlight> in almost all Western countries, with the fastest growth in places that historically had rather few trees.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 几乎所有西方国家的森林都在扩张，增长最快的地方是历史上树木很少的地方。

examination_example.sentence: The fish is <highlight>spreading</highlight>, and that's a cause for concern.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 鱼群在扩散，这是一个值得关注的问题。

examination_example.sentence: Of all those trends, however, the <highlight>spread</highlight> of water shortages poses the most immediate threat.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，在所有这些趋势中，水资源短缺的蔓延构成了最直接的威胁。

sense_info_list.en: separate something into parts and divide them between different times or different people
sense_info_list.zh: 分若干次进行; 由若干人分摊

examination_example.sentence: The evening meal carries the full burden that used to be <highlight>spread</highlight> over two meals
examination_example.sentence_trans: 晚餐承载着过去两顿饭的全部负担。

sense_info_list.en: apply a substance to an object or surface in an even layer
sense_info_list.zh: 涂抹; 覆盖; 涂层; 覆盖物

word_usage.usage: spread既可用作及物动词，也可用作不及物动词。其宾语后接介词on组成短语，表示“把…铺在或涂在…上”； 接介词with组成短语，表示“用…铺满或涂满”。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 拓展; 扩张; 传播
展开; 张开

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 扩散出去；铺开；蔓延出来

sense_info_list.en: distribute or disperse (something) over a certain area;
sense_info_list.zh: 拓展; 扩张; 传播

examination_example.sentence: The wish to <highlight>spread</highlight> digital technology.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 传播数字技术的愿景。

examination_example.sentence: If it works, the idea could <highlight>spread</highlight> to other parts of the country.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果它成功了，这个想法就可以传播到美国的其他地方。

examination_example.sentence: Now that information is being <highlight>spread</highlight> and monitored (监控) in different ways, researchers are discovering new rules.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在信息正以不同的方式被传播和监控，研究人员正在发现新的规则。

sense_info_list.en: open out (something) so as to extend its surface area, width, or length
sense_info_list.zh: 展开; 张开

exam_freq_info.chinese: 蔓延; 传播; 分散; 延伸
展开; 使散开; 张开
涂抹; 覆盖; 涂层; 覆盖物

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 遍及；遍布各地；四散蔓延

sense_info_list.en: distribute or disperse (something) over a certain area;
sense_info_list.zh: 蔓延; 传播; 分散; 延伸

examination_example.sentence: He spent 13 years travelling around the other states, <highlight>spreading</highlight> his ideas.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他花了13年的时间周游列国，传播自己的思想。

examination_example.sentence: A month later, when the leaves <highlight>spread</highlight> quickly, I discovered they were like wild orchids (兰花) in the forest.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一个月后，当叶子迅速舒展开时，我发现它们就像森林中的野生兰花。

examination_example.sentence: Beijing Opera has <highlight>spread</highlight> to many other places.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 京剧已经传播到许多其他地方。

sense_info_list.en: open out (something) so as to extend its surface area, width, or length
sense_info_list.zh: 展开; 使散开; 张开

examination_example.sentence: Because starting in the center lets your brain <highlight>spread</highlight> out in all directions and express itself more freely and naturally.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因为从中心开始让你的大脑向各个方向展开，更自由、更自然地表达自己。

examination_example.sentence: Jump into the air and <highlight>spread</highlight> your arms and legs into a star shape.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 跳到空中，把你的胳膊和腿展开成星形。

sense_info_list.en: apply a substance to an object or surface in an even layer
sense_info_list.zh: 涂抹; 覆盖; 涂层; 覆盖物

examination_example.sentence: There he takes in the water with his trunk, and <highlight>spreads</highlight> it all over his body.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在那里，他会用鼻子吸水，然后再把水洒满全身。

word_usage.usage: spread既可用作及物动词，也可用作不及物动词。其宾语后接介词on组成短语，表示“把…铺在或涂在…上”； 接介词with组成短语，表示“用…铺满或涂满”。
